main event: On 10 September 1958, a UFO sighting was reported north of San Bernardino, California. The witness described two objects, one large and one small, with a ball-like shape and dark color. The objects caused interference with a TV set and were observed moving in various directions before fading away.
interesting points: The sighting involved two objects, one in front and one above and behind, both described as having a ball-like shape and a dark color.
The UFOs caused buzzing on a TV set, indicating electromagnetic interference.
The observer noted the objects moving in various directions, including stopping and swaying before fading away.
The report mentioned the lack of a photograph and the uncertainties regarding the nature of the objects, labeling them as possibly balloons, aircraft, or astronomical.
The witness, a woman from Highland, California, was described as sincere and sober by the senior controller.
sighted object: two ball-shaped objects causing electromagnetic interference
